name: Wistful-Group 6
description:
Instructions:
Use WASD keys to move the player

Use the mouse to rotate the player

Press Space to Jump

Press E to collect an item (hint: it's a ladder, rocket, photo, kite)

Press E to place the ladder at the placement area (cube on the floor) near the treehouse

Press the left mouse button to use the rocket if you have it. 

Click full-screen if you want to see the rocket UI.

NOTE: If the WebGL version isn't working/has errors, try to download the windows/mac build for your respective PC.
